titles: A sober enquiry into the nature, measure and principle of moral virtue, its distinction from gospel-holiness with reflections upon what occurs disserviceable to truth and religion in this matter : in three late books, viz. Ecclesiastical policy, Defence and continuation, and Reproof to The rehearsal transpos'd / by R.F.
author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.
notes: Attributed to Robert Ferguson. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Parker, Samuel, 1640-1688. --  Discourse of ecclesiastical politie.
Parker, Samuel, 1640-1688. --  Reproof to the Rehearsal transprosed.
